imdb.plot outline: The complete story of the Popular Music in Spain between the years 1968-1978, made with the appearances of more than 30 musicians and personalities involved in that "golden years" for the Spanish Culture, and with the best documents from the TVE vaults, all remastered (audio/video).
imdb.title: Música ligerísima: Música popular española 1968-1978
plot: The complete story of the Popular Music in Spain between the years 1968-1978.::Antonio Moreno Álvarez

The complete story of the Popular Music in Spain between the years 1968-1978, made with the appearances of more than 30 musicians and personalities involved in that "golden years" for the Spanish Culture, and with the best documents from the TVE vaults, all remastered (audio/video).
